description.title: GoCheer——Translator Extension with achievement system
description.content: A chrome extention, which gives user the translation of selected content in web pages and give achievements if user's behavior attain some condition.

description.title: Progrect Team
description.content: 3 students in 2 months. Developed with Java JSP and HTML/CSS/Bootstrap/JavaScript in fore-end.

description.title: Responsibility
description.content: As Team leader, I was responsible for system architecture design, web fore-end development and back-end realization.

description.title: Quanzhen Cinema——A cinemma management system
description.content: A cinema management system including movie arrangement, ticket module and data visualization module.

description.title: Project Team
description.content: 10 people/1 week. Developed in C#, and C# Razor/HTML/Css/JQuery.

description.title: Moment——Undergraduates innovation platform
description.content: A innovation program platform for undergraduates, teachers and enterprises to build team and make publicity.

description.title: Bilibili Marble game
description.content: Win32 application game. Classic marble game.
